mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profile (email, nickname, age, gender, zone, introduce, imageRoot, imgThumbImg) VALUES ( #{email}, #{nickname}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{zone}, #{introduce}, #{imageRoot}, #{imgThumbImg} )
INSERT INTO interests ( email, hobby1, hobby2, hobby3 ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{hobby1}, #{hobby2}, #{hobby3} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM profile p, interests i WHERE p.email = i.email AND p.email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE profile SET nickname = #{nickname}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, zone = #{zone}, introduce = #{introduce}, imageRoot = #{imageRoot}, imgThumbImg = #{imgThumbImg} WHERE email = #{email}

UPDATE interests SET hobby1 = #{hobby1}, hobby2 = #{hobby2}, hobby3 = #{hobby3}
WHERE email = #{email}
